name: The Darked
description:
The Darked is an open world survival game. There are only 2 things that will keep you alive. Silence and hope.

Loot!

  • Be careful while adapting to natural conditions. You can obtain items from towns, cities, military areas, and areas where life is toxic.

Build your home!

  • Build yourself a cozy house or a sheltered castle in unlimited combinations. Equip your home as you want!

War!

  • Find the best weapon for yourself and beat your opponents. What matters is not what weapon you use, but how you use it.

Get dressed!

  • Wear appropriate clothes for your situation. Remember, every outfit has different attributes! You must have them to choose.

Hunt!

  • Hunt and cook to feed.

Improve yourself!

  • Show off your blacksmithing skills while processing mines.

Safe Zone!

  • Trade in safe areas where no one can touch you, Meet your needs and grow stronger.

???

  • Don't go into dark tunnels without your flashlight! It could be much more than the tunnel you come across! Can you take a risk?

Are you alone in this adventure or with your crew? Remember, everything is in your hands!
